title.narrative: Mozaik Lonac pro - Collective Impact for Youth
Mozaik Lonac pro - Collective Impact for Youth

description.narrative:
The overall objective during the intervention of 3 years id to strengthen sustainable, country-wide, multi-stakeholder and value -driven ecosystem that provides ongoing and tailor-made opportunities for any young women and men, regardless of their identities or location in succeeding in the social and/or economic sector in Bosnia and Herzegovina.
The impact and goal of the intervention will be achieved through three outcomes whereby each outcome has further outputs and respective activities aimed at meeting the overall objective. Three listed outcomes are as follows: 1) strong and lasting partnerships with the local authorities established that directly influence use of available public resources to provide support to young female and male entrepreneurs. 2) Strong ecosystem for start up entrepreneurship and philanthropy is established within the community Lonac.pro with partnerships that create various opportunities for professional success of young women and men. 3) To design and deliver meaningful and tailor-made opportunities for young female and male entrepreneurs to start their own sustainable micro-businesses.
More specifically, expected results such as creation of 300 jobs, implementation of 300 community projects aimed at improving local communities, successful disbursement of grants to facilitate establishment and growth of micro-business, building sustainable relationships with local authorities, building capacities of young women and men to further develop in social and economic realm of the society contribute to an objective of reaching sustainable systematic solution.

tag.narrative: 1.4 - By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

1.4 - Senast 2030 säkerställa att alla män och kvinnor, i synnerhet de fattiga och de utsatta, har lika rätt till ekonomiska resurser, tillgång till grundläggande tjänster, möjlighet att äga och kontrollera mark och andra former av egendom samt tillgång till arv, naturresurser, lämplig ny teknik och finansiella tjänster, inklusive mikrokrediter.
4.4 - By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

4.4 - Till 2030 väsentligen öka det antal ungdomar och vuxna som har relevanta färdigheter, däribland tekniska färdigheter och yrkeskunnande, för sysselsättning, anständigt arbete och entreprenörskap.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
8.2 - Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.
8.2 - Uppnå högre ekonomisk produktivitet genom diversifiering, teknisk uppgradering och innovation, bland annat genom att fokusera på sektorer med högt förädlingsvärde och hög arbetsintensitet.
